name: Flipborg
description:
[ FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE THROUGH YOUR BROWSER 

PLEASE PLAY OUR GAME ON FULLSCREEN BY DOUBLE CLICK THE SCREEN ]

An intense 2D platformer where you flip the gravity to make your way. Navigate through rooms filled with hazards, steal the key item, then escape to complete your mission.  No one said it's gonna be easy!
